attributes.action: amnesty for council tax arrears, for people on low income (under £15000 per year)
attributes.additional_details: With the whole country suffering, why do us, the lowest paid workers, have to suffer quite so much? if you get into arrears of any sort you get time and a chance to "catch up" except with Council tax . . .its straight to court and on goes another few hundred pounds (which just puts the nail in the coffin) and low and behold, very quickly a small debt becomes a huge debt which you still cant pay . . blood out of a stone comes to mind! but hey, you could always get the sack and join the dole queue and get everything paid!!!
